name: Gumball (Eva Lee)
description:
Controls
  • Left click to replace a tile with whatever you have (it's randomized)
  • Left click to restart the game when you die
  • Use WASD, ZQSD, or arrow keys to adjust the view
Credits
  • Gumball is a game by Eva Lee (evajolene.com)
  • The m5x7 font is by Daniel Linssen (managore.itch.io)
  • Sound effects generated using BFXR by increpare (increpare.com)
